data.title: Who is free?
data.statement:
When I asked all my friends if they are free (aka available) or not, they responded thus.

Please summarize:
‣ How many of my friends are free [[numFree]] ?
‣ What percentage of my friends are free [[percentFree]] ?

testCases.title: Test 1
testCases.testIn: Viviana is free, Flavia is not free, Kamala is free, Zelina is not free

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn: Valentina is free, Paccia is not free

testCases.title: everyone is free - Test 2

data.stubGenerator:
read responses:string(2000)
write summary of how many are free
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> Each friend's name followed by either {{is free}} or {{is not free}}
Status of each friend is divided by a comma and space ({{, }})
data.outputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> [[numFree]] [[percentFree]]{{%}}
(separated by a space)

[[percentFree]] should be rounded to the nearest integer

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

When I asked all my friends if they are free (aka available) or not, they responded thus.

Please summarize:
‣ How many of my friends are free numFree ?
‣ What percentage of my friends are free percentFree ?
Input
Line 1: Each friend's name followed by either is free or is not free
Status of each friend is divided by a comma and space (, )
Output
Line 1: numFree percentFree%
(separated by a space)

percentFree should be rounded to the nearest integer
Constraints
1 < number of friends < 100
Example
Input
Viviana is free, Flavia is not free, Kamala is free, Zelina is not free
Output
2 50%
